PHRASE.LANG: You're a fiend that presides over all the evil spirits of the deep, and you've got the attire to prove it with this bundle. Includes Salty Dog Head, Salty Dog Top, Salty Dog Bottom and Salty Dog Boots. [#Legal]

Vous êtes un démon qui règne sur tous les mauvais esprits de l'Abysse! Veuillez vous habiller de façon appropriée avec cet ensemble. L'ensemble comprend la Tête de Brigand, le Haut de Brigand, le Bas de Brigand, et les Bottes de Brigand. [#Legal]

You're a fiend that presides over all the evil spirits of the deep, and you've got the attire to prove it with this bundle. Includes Salty Dog Head, Salty Dog Top, Salty Dog Bottom and Salty Dog Boots. [#Legal]
